com.samsung.android.sdk.mediacontrol

Interface SmcDevice

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    SmcAvPlayer, SmcImageViewer, SmcProvider

    public interface SmcDevice
    This interface provides methods to get information about a device. You can cast it to a sub class using TYPE_XXXX constants.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static int DOMAIN_LOCAL_NETWORK
      Device located in local network area.
      static int DOMAIN_MY_DEVICE
      Own device.
      static int DOMAIN_REMOTE_NETWORK
      Device located in Internet area.
      static int DOMAIN_UNKNOWN
      Device with unknown domain.
      static int TYPE_AVPLAYER
      Audio and video player.
      static int TYPE_IMAGEVIEWER
      Image viewer.
      static int TYPE_PROVIDER
      Media provider.
      static int TYPE_UNKNOWN
      Unknown device type.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      int getDeviceDomain()
      Get the device network domain.
      int getDeviceType()
      Get the device type.
      List<SmcIcon> getIconList()
      Get the list of all icon URIs of the device.
      Uri getIconUri()
      Get the representative icon URI of the device.
      String getId()
      Get the device unique ID.
      String getIpAddress()
      Get the device IP address.
      String getModelName()
      Get the device model name.
      String getName()
      Get the device name specified by the user.
      String getNetworkInterface()
      Get the name of the connected device network interface.

    • Field Detail

      • DOMAIN_MY_DEVICE

        static final int DOMAIN_MY_DEVICE
        Own device.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • DOMAIN_LOCAL_NETWORK

        static final int DOMAIN_LOCAL_NETWORK
        Device located in local network area.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • DOMAIN_REMOTE_NETWORK

        static final int DOMAIN_REMOTE_NETWORK
        Device located in Internet area.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • DOMAIN_UNKNOWN

        static final int DOMAIN_UNKNOWN
        Device with unknown domain.

        Unknown domain means that no appropriate network area is found for the device. This could happen if the device is not a network device. Do not use this type as an input parameter.

        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • TYPE_IMAGEVIEWER

        static final int TYPE_IMAGEVIEWER
        Image viewer.

        You can cast this device as SmcImageViewer.

        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • TYPE_AVPLAYER

        static final int TYPE_AVPLAYER
        Audio and video player.

        You can cast this device as SmcAvPlayer .

        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • TYPE_PROVIDER

        static final int TYPE_PROVIDER
        Media provider.

        You can cast this device as SmcProvider.

        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • TYPE_UNKNOWN

        static final int TYPE_UNKNOWN
        Unknown device type.

        Unknown device type means no appropriate type is found for the device. This could happen if the device in not defined in this version of the Media Control package. Do not use this type as an input parameter.

        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

    • Method Detail

      • getModelName

        String getModelName()
        Get the device model name.

        Returns:
        Name for the device model set by the manufacturer. This method returns null if no model information is available.

      • getDeviceType

        int getDeviceType()
        Get the device type.

        Returns:
        The device type.

        The valid values are:

        • TYPE_AVPLAYER
        • TYPE_IMAGEVIEWER
        • TYPE_PROVIDER
        • TYPE_UNKNOWN

      • getIpAddress

        String getIpAddress()
        Get the device IP address.
        Returns:
        The device IP address. This method returns an empty string if no IP information is available.

      • getName

        String getName()
        Get the device name specified by the user.
        Returns:
        The device name specified by the user. This method returns an empty string if no name information is available.

      • getIconUri

        Uri getIconUri()
        Get the representative icon URI of the device.
        Returns:
        The icon URI of the device. This method returns null if no representative icon information is available.

      • getIconList

        List<SmcIcon> getIconList()
        Get the list of all icon URIs of the device.
        Returns:
        The list of icon URIs of the device. This method returns empty list if no icon information is available.

      • getId

        String getId()
        Get the device unique ID.
        Returns:
        The device unique ID. Example formats include values such as uuid:08f0d180-0002-1000-8823-00245491c0ab. This method returns an empty string if the no unique ID information is available.

      • getNetworkInterface

        String getNetworkInterface()
        Get the name of the connected device network interface.
        Returns:
        The device network interface name. Example values include "eth0" and "lo". This method returns null if no connected network interface information is available.

      • getDeviceDomain

        int getDeviceDomain()
        Get the device network domain.
        Returns:
        The device domain.

        The valid values are:

        • DOMAIN_LOCAL_NETWORK
        • DOMAIN_MY_DEVICE
        • DOMAIN_REMOTE_NETWORK
        • DOMAIN_UNKNOWN
